thread.title: Yolanda E and whole entire family and friends
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Yolanda E and whole entire family and friends

author: Yolanda E and whole entire family and friends
title: Yolanda E and whole entire family and friends
text: Hello I would like to take a moment and share my countless experiences with this company. I have been a customer slash family member to R. G Brenner organization for 25 plus years now, I started out with a Rep named Roland in the beginning , I have since had a relationship ship with two others in my 29 years of being a member to this outstanding organization. one being Lester who is no longer with this company who put in more than his time but his heart as well and he will be deeply missed by the community. But has moved on to enjoying his life and family full time. Which has bought me to Mr. R Nichols. Well let me take a moment to share my ongoing experiences with Mr. Nicholas and his staff over on 125 th street.there are two more than wonderful Extremely knowledgeable young ladies whom I have had the opportunity to do business as well as for advice as well as forwarding documents when needed to outside entities with , of course consent to release these two ladies who are Cathy and Nicole Exceeds themselves in Professionalism and outstanding customer services. The company pricess are consistent and there adequate preparation of your taxes is phenomenal. I am a die hard newyorker who relocated out of state to open a business but I still travel for the past 16 years back to this company for the preparation of my personal as well as my building taxes. But that is not all in my 29 years of being a customer I have recommended over 100 people to this organization, that I trust with my most sensitive documents and personal business. I wish that the whole world could Experience what it feels like to put your trust in the hands of individuals who takes pride in stand up and represent this company as if it was there own. I personally thank Mr. Nichols every year that he remains a part of this organization because with out him and his staff R. G Brenner Would mean this much to me that I put my word and signature behind them. Thank you Ronald Nichols and staff for Outstanding and consistent Excellent Service.
